events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly. Thank you for your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department and will be assessed by our recruiter specialized in software development roles.
A recruiter experienced in engineering hires has been assigned to your application and will reach out to schedule an initial screening interview.
We conducted the initial screening interview to discuss your background and experience as a software engineer. You demonstrated strong skills relevant to our needs.
Thank you for your positive feedback following the screening. You expressed enthusiasm about the role and are eager to proceed to the next stage.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 2 PM UTC. This session will evaluate your coding and problem-solving abilities in detail.
The technical interview went well. You successfully completed the coding exercises and demonstrated good understanding of software architecture principles.
An HR interview is scheduled for May 10th at 11 AM UTC to discuss company culture, benefits, and your general fit within the team.
The HR interview was completed successfully. You asked insightful questions and expressed alignment with the company values and work environment.
We have extended a formal job offer to you for the Software Engineer position. Please review the attached details regarding compensation and start date.
You have provided feedback indicating that the offer meets your expectations and you are excited about joining the engineering team.
You have officially accepted the job offer. Welcome aboard! Our HR team will contact you soon with onboarding instructions.
Your onboarding process has begun. We have scheduled your orientation session and set up access to all necessary development tools.
The hiring process is now officially closed. You have successfully joined the engineering team as a Software Engineer. We look forward to your contributions.
